text: Nabi muminadera kache tadera nijedera ceye'o ghanistatara [1] ebam tamra strigana tadera ma [2]. Ara allahara bidhana anusare mumina o muhajiraganera ceye---yara atmiya tara paraspara kachakachi [3]. Tabe tomara tomadera bandhu-bandhabera prati kalyanakara kichu karara katha alada [4]. Eta kibhabe lipibad'dha rayeche
